DOC.brief_summary: This study begin develop culturally appropriate secondary prevention intervention young HIV+ woman focus group . Using three intervention site , focus group guide development intervention 's framework content area . An intervention developed/adapted data collect focus group review relevant intervention . The intervention aim address following concern : 1 ) reduce risk young woman infect HIV transmit virus sexual partner , 2 ) prevent young woman infect HIV re-infection new viral strain co-infection another sexually transmit disease .
DOC.brief_title: Empowerment Intervention Young Women - Phase I
DOC.detailed_description: This study develop/adapt culturally appropriate secondary prevention intervention young HIV+ woman focus group . Using three intervention site , focus group guide development intervention 's framework content area . An initial list content area potential activity presentation focus group develop protocol team review exist HIV prevention intervention implement adolescent young adult , well intervention target HIV+ population . Three focus group convene ( 1 per select ATN site ) young woman live HIV solicit information intervention need . All focus group digitally record transcribe . Executive summary group focus major theme elicit probe explore proposed content structure intervention . The summary generate member Protocol Team base review integration data ) focus group flip chart ; b ) digitally record comment participant ; c ) digitally record oral summary moderator offer focus group ; ) thematic note take assistant moderator focus group . Based outcome focus group , intervention module develop modified collaboration Youth Advisory Team .
DOC.criteria: Female birth currently female ; Receives service one select ATN sit community partner ; HIVinfected document medical record review verbal verification refer professional ; Between age 1624 ( inclusive ) time informed consent/assent ; Ability understand write spoken English ; Gives inform consent/assent study participation . Presence active , serious psychiatric symptom ( hallucination , think disorder ) would impair participant 's ability meet study requirement ; Visibly distraught ( suicidal , homicidal , exhibit violent behavior ) ; If serious condition present screening , Protocol Team must consult determine whether enrollment may interfere evaluation protocol objective permission proceed enrollment ; Intoxicated influence alcohol substance time study enrollment* . Participants visibly influence time consent , enrollment , focus group . Intoxication time focus group exclude participation .
DOC.keyword: Adolescent Medicine Trials Network HIV/AIDS Interventions
